statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, value, timestamp, sensor_location FROM sensor_data ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, value, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Kitchen' AND value > 50;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id < 10 GROUP BY sensor_location;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 10;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) AS date FROM sensor_data GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_name, reading, timestamp FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 100
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, timestamp, reading FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-01' ORDER BY reading ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorData JOIN AnomalyDetection ON SensorData.sensor_id = AnomalyDetection.sensor_id WHERE SensorData.sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY detection_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(reading) > 50 ORDER BY avg_reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS anomaly_count FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE anomalous_reading > 100 GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY anomaly_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM historical_sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(reading_value) FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE owner='John Doe';
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_description FROM anomaly_detection_models;
SELECT * FROM historical_sensor_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC, sensor_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_timestamp FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND owner = 'John Doe';

SELECT h.sensor_id, m.model_name, h.reading_value FROM historical_sensor_data h JOIN anomaly_detection_models m ON h.sensor_id = m.model_id WHERE h.reading_value < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, model_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM historical_sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT category_name FROM sensor_categories ORDER BY category_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_value FROM historical_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_locations WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT model_id, model_name, created_date FROM anomaly_detection_models WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_locations ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_categories WHERE category_name = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, alert_type FROM sensor_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location = 'Room A' AND description LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_value > 50;

SELECT s.sensor_id, s.timestamp, s.sensor_value, l.log_type, a.alert_type, a.alert_timestamp, ad.detection_result FROM sensor_data s LEFT JOIN sensor_logs l ON s.sensor_id = l.sensor_id LEFT JOIN sensor_alerts a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id LEFT JOIN anomaly_detection ad ON a.alert_id = ad.alert_id ORDER BY s.timestamp DESC;
